short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the 'RUN' button in the civitai.com to generate the similer iamges.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Assistant for civitai.com.
------------
FEATURES : on the civitai.com, you can click the 'RUN' button in the image information pop-up box to generate a new picture according to the parameters.
-----------
More features coming soon.
